message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm initially offering it at $22,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider coming down to $19,000. This offer reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your interest.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $16,000. Can you consider this offer?
